Things about me

Hey folks! My name is Stafanus. Currently I am a full-time student in University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign, pursuing computer engineering degree. I love tech (DUH!), start-ups, and design. I am also working on a few projects here and there that I would share in this blog.

My full resume and projects that I worked on would be posted soon! Meanwhile, just hit me on up on twitter!
